start.text: A massive surge of Imaginum energy ripples through your connection to the world. A spectral presence manifestsâ€”two distinct voices echo in your mind. You have reached a level of synchronization where a choice must be made. Which ideology will you anchor your soul to?

cogwheel_path.text: You embrace the path of reconstruction. The Cogwheel's essence flows into you, sharpening your resolve and reinforcing your strikes. (Permanent +15% Attack Bonus)

verdant_path.text: You embrace the path of the world-tree. The Verdant's essence flows into you, toughening your skin and grounding your physical form. (Permanent +15% Defense Bonus)

options.text: Accept the gift of the Grove.

end.text: The spectral presence fades, leaving you fundamentally changed. Your odyssey continues.
